newsitem.title: JAPAN: TOCOM rubber up on higher other commodity prices.
newsitem.headline: TOCOM rubber up on higher other commodity prices.

text.p: Tokyo rubber futures ended higher across the board on Tuesday as buying gathered force late in the day, supported by rises in other commodity futures in Japan, traders said.
Prices ranged from 0.3 yen to 1.5 yen per kg higher. Benchmark January was up 0.5 yen at 124.5 yen.
The market started the day on weaker tone on profit-taking.

"Market sentiment has turned moderately bullish, backed by rises in other commodity futures today and a perception that the yen will stay weak against the dollar in the near term," one analyst at a commodity broker said.
